lead_paragraph: The Southern California native Jimmie Johnson pulled away in overtime to beat Kevin Harvick for Johnson’s record sixth Nascar Sprint Cup Series victory at Fontana.
snippet: The Southern California native Jimmie Johnson pulled away in overtime to beat Kevin Harvick for Johnson’s record sixth Nascar Sprint Cup Series victory at Fontana.
abstract: Jimmie Johnson wins Nascar Sprint Cup Series race at Fontana in overtime; other racing news noted.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
